titleStmt.title: Cato major, of old age a poem / by the Honourable Sir John Denham ...
Cato maior de senectute. English
titleStmt.author: Cicero, Marcus Tullius.
Denham, John, Sir, 1615-1669.

notesStmt.note: A paraphrase in verse of Cicero's De senectute.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
